contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Graye-sur-Mer |image = Graye plage.jpg |image coat of arms = Blason ville fr Graye-sur-Mer (Calvados).svg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Bayeux |canton = Ryes |INSEE = 14318 |postal code = 14470 |mayor = Jean-Pierre LachÃ¨vre |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Bessin, Seulles et Mer |longitude = -0.4711 |latitude = 49.33 |elevation m = 6 |elevation min m = 2 |elevation max m = 47 |area km2 = 6.54 |population = 652 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Graye-sur-Mer}} '''Graye-sur-Mer''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. The commune probably acquired its name from an old landed estate in its vicinity owned by a knight subordinate to [[William the Conqueror]], [[Anchetil de Greye]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|460 |1968|416 |1975|405 |1982|525 |1990|567 |1999|593 |2008|652 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Grayesurmer}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
